headline: Applied Materials, Broadcom, Lam Research, Western Digital, and Allegro MicroSystems Shares Are Falling, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after the semiconductor sector tumbled as a 'buy the rumor, sell the news' event unfolded around AI-chip leader Nvidia, despite its strong earnings report.

headline: Apis Capital Expands Garrett Motion Stake as Hybrid Demand Extends the Combustion Cycle
summary: Apis Capital Advisors increased its stake in Garrett Motion, a key supplier of turbocharging systems used in combustion and hybrid vehicles. With global auto production still dominated by hybrid and traditional engines, investors are weighing how long that demand cycle can support earnings growth.

raw.headline: Apis Capital Expands Garrett Motion Stake as Hybrid Demand Extends the Combustion Cycle

headline: Western Digital G DRIVE Relaunch Tests Pricing Power After Strong Rally
summary: Western Digital has relaunched its G-DRIVE label as the single brand for its high end external storage lineup. The move coincides with Western Digital becoming a pure play HDD company and retiring the SanDisk Professional name. The refreshed G-DRIVE range is aimed at creative professionals and other users who need higher performance external storage. For investors tracking NasdaqGS:WDC, this brand reset sits alongside a share price of $290.95 and very strong multiyear returns, including...
